settings.title: What sizes do you carry?
settings.text:
We currently carry sizes Small, Medium, Large & Extra Large in the majority of our seamless products. Some of our less compressive garments come in blended sizes (i.e., S/M and L/XL), as seamless garments can grow and contract with you!

We offer extended sizing from XS to XXL in our most popular seamless garments: the Pull-Down Postpartum + Nursing Support Tanktop, the Maternity Belly Support Tanktop, the Highwaist Postpartum + Nursing Support Leggings & the Maternity Belly Support Leggings. We carry sizes 0, 2, 4, 6, 8, 10, 12 and 14 in our BLANQI Denim Maternity & Postpartum skinny jeans! To select the most accurate size, follow our size chart below. Remember, the best fit will be found using your current height & weight (it’s okay if you’ve moved up a pant size or two during your pregnancy, what matters is that you find the right fit for you, right now!

settings.title: How do I find my size?
settings.text: When purchasing any BLANQI seamless product, it's important to find the size that's right for you! Due to the compressive nature of our seamless garments, picking a size too small may cause discomfort when wearing. We size all of our garments by the below size chart! Follow your current height & weight to find the best fit for you, maternity or postpartum!

settings.title: Should I size up if I am pregnant?
settings.text: Not necessarily! Check out our size chart and find your size by matching up your current height & weight. If you are between sizes, sizing down may result in added compression & support while sizing up may result in a more comfortable, relaxed fit.

settings.title: When will you be adding extended sizing?
settings.text: We currently offer extended sizing in our 4 most popular maternity & postpartum garments, with more to come!

settings.title: What's the difference between the BLANQI Maternity Leggings and the BLANQI Postpartum Leggings? Can I just wear the postpartum leggings while pregnant?
settings.text: All of our EVERYDAY leggings feature the same breathable, seam-free fabric. The key difference between our Maternity Belly Support Leggings and our Postpartum Highwaist Nursing Support Leggings is the waist construction & seamless knit design. Our maternity leggings feature our patented built-in belly panel to help support a growing baby bump! We use a patented design that actually reduces the amount of compression at the belly, allowing for the ultimate in stretch without any tightness or pressure on your belly. Due to our unique belly panel design, the leggings would actually accentuate your belly if worn postpartum. Our Highwaist leggings feature a solid knit waist that covers your stomach just up to your bra line. The ribbed knit section at the waist is single-ply so it smooths without adding bulk, but doesn't compress your tummy like a pair of shapewear might. We do not recommend wearing our Highwaist legging beyond your 2nd trimester, as it may be too compressive & uncomfortable on your bump!

settings.title: What's the difference between the BLANQI SportSupport Cuffed Leggings and the BLANQI SportSupport Contour Leggings?
settings.text: The SportSupport leggings are knit as a heavier weight than our Everyday Leggings, with more design details built-into the legging. Both of our SportSupport leggings feature a 2-ply waistband that can be worn both pregnant or postpartum. The key differences between the Contour & Cuffed styles are the length & the knit design. Our Cuffed leggings were designed with a longer inseam, to be worn over your heels or tucked into boots. Our Contour leggings are for the mamas who prefer a shorter, ankle-length legging - whether you're working out or simply lounging!

settings.title: What's the difference between the BLANQI Everyday Hipster Leggings and the BLANQI Everyday Highwaist + Nursing Leggings?
settings.text: Our Highwaist leggings feature a solid knit waist that covers your stomach just up to your bra line. The waist is single-ply so it smooths without adding bulk, but doesn't compress your tummy like a pair of shapewear might. Our Hipster is a 2- ply waistband that targets the postpartum belly that can linger for months and sometimes years after baby is born. "Once postpartum, always postpartum" - our Hipsters help tighten up your core and any loose skin that makes you feel less like yourself. By the way, you don't have to give birth to wear the BLANQI Hipster Leggings - they're a great everyday legging!.

settings.title: Can I wear the BLANQI Everyday Hipster Leggings while pregnant?
settings.text: We do not recommend wearing our Everyday Hipster leggings beyond your 1st trimester, as the 2-ply waistband was designed to compress and tighten your core. The waistband will therefore become uncomfortable and work against your growing belly bump! You can however wear them immediately postpartum to help realign a post-birth belly and offer lower back support!

settings.title: What's the best trimester to start wearing the BLANQI Maternity Leggings?
settings.text: Depending on your body, you will find that your support needs will vary. In the 1st trimester, these will help accentuate your belly, so you may feel like you appear more pregnant than just bloated. By the 2nd trimester, these will be your go-to leggings for everyday comfort and support. By the 3rd trimester, these doubled up with a support tank will provide the ultimate in belly and back relief from pregnancy aches and pains.

settings.title: Do I have to wear a bra under the BLANQI Maternity or Postpartum Tank Tops?
settings.text: Our over-bust tanks do not feature a built-in bra, however the support that we have designed in our seamless knit tanks actually cups and supports your sensitive breasts. We did however design the straps of both the Maternity Belly Support Tank Top and the Pull-Down Nursing Tank Top to be thick & sturdy enough to camouflage most bra straps. It's a matter of preference, but if you find yourself with smaller breasts during pregnancy or immediately following, our tank tops may provide enough chest support to go without a bra!

settings.title: Can I wear the BLANQI Maternity Belly Support Tank Top on its own?
settings.text: Yes! All of our EVERYDAY over-bust tank tops are completely opaque. Our overbust tank tops were designed to be worn out as you would a favorite tank top or tee! Both the Maternity Belly Support Tank Top and the Pull-Down Nursing Tank Top can also work well as layering tanks, especially in cold weather. These tank tops feature a longer length for full coverage. If you are petite or looking for something shorter, our Crossback Tank is our athletic length tank top with the same great belly support!

settings.title: What's the difference between the BLANQI Maternity Belly Support Tank Top and the BLANQI Maternity Support Crossback Tank?
settings.text: Our SportSupport Maternity Support Crossback Tank shares the same belly support knit design as our Everyday Maternity Belly Support Tank, but instead features a shorter length & support crossover straps.

settings.title: Can I wear the BLANQI Maternity Leggings to the gym?
settings.text: Yes! Our unique high belly panel design keeps these leggings in place, even for the most active mamas. The Maternity Leggings are completely opaque, so no need to worry about sheerness while working out. Our leggings have great wicking and stretch & recovery capabilities, so sweating it out shouldn't be an issue. For an even cooler option, try working out in our BLANQI Maternity Belly Support Girlshorts and pair with our BLANQI Body Racerback Tank (it cools your body temperature by nearly 2 degrees Fahrenheit)!

settings.title: What products do you recommend for my hospital bag?
settings.text:
We always recommend our BLANQI Everyday Highwaist Postpartum + Nursing Support leggings for your hospital bag! Purchase during your 3rd trimester for the most accurate size. These wonder leggings gently compress your newly postpartum belly, but don't cut so tight that you can't breathe as you recover. Psst.. they help keep those bulky pads in place and give an all over squeeze that makes you feel more put together & realigned! We designed them with nursing in mind, so throw on a tank or sweater and simply lift up to nurse without showing off your postpartum belly.

Another great hospital bag essential is our BLANQI Everyday Pull-Down Nursing Support Tank Top. With more compression than our highwaist leggings, this tank gives the ultimate support in realigning a postpartum tummy. The neckline can easily be pulled down to nurse and the thick straps help hide any nursing bra straps! The completely opaque design means this tank can be worn independently (and we love to pair with a cute oversized cardi)!

settings.title: Can I wear the BLANQI Highwaist + Nursing Leggings after a C-Section?
settings.text: Yes! Our BLANQI Highwaist Postpartum Leggings hug your postpartum tummy and gently wrap healing C-section scars. The unique high waist does not interfere or cut off at the tummy, causing any friction on a healing C-section scar.

settings.title: How soon can I wear the BLANQI Postpartum Leggings?
settings.text: We recommend purchasing the BLANQI Postpartum Leggings in your 3rd trimester to pack in your hospital bag! They're the first leggings you will want to put on right after delivery, thanks to the comfortable seam-free knit design. Our Postpartum Leggings are designed for the bodies that motherhood made, so all of the squeezy, loose and sore postpartum bellies will benefit from the smoothing support these offer. Bonus – our Postpartum Leggings keep bulky pads in place & give a nice gentle squeeze to your postpartum belly.

settings.title: Can I wear the BLANQI Maternity Tank Top after delivery?
settings.text: This tank can be worn postpartum, but because the belly area is designed to support and cradle a pregnant belly, you will find that our Postpartum/Nursing tanks offer the support you need to smooth, secure and firm up postpartum bellies.

settings.title: If I keep pulling down the BLANQI Pull-Down Nursing Tank Top, will I stretch out the neckline?
settings.text: The neckline is designed to stretch & recover when gently pulling down for nursing! Make sure you adjust to fit around your nursing bra or breast when nursing and pull back into place when you're done!

settings.title: What's the difference between the BLANQI Pull-Down Postpartum Nursing Support Tank and the BLANQI Lift-Up Access Underbust Postpartum Nursing Support Tank?
settings.text: The main difference between our two Everyday Nursing Tanks in is the chest coverage. They both offer the same smoothing support and length coverage that mimics a regular tank bottom band, but the Pull-down Tank top can be worn with or without a bra, can be worn alone or layered, and has a stretchy neckline that easily stretches & recovers for easy nursing access. The Lift-Up tank is ideal for moms who lift-up their shirts to nurse, with an open bust area that works great for moms who have to pump at work and want their belly covered when doing that at the office, home or wherever pumping takes them!

settings.title: What products do you recommend if I am having multiples?
settings.text: We recommend purchasing the BLANQI Maternity Belly Support Tank Top or BLANQI Maternity Underbust Belly Support Tank Top for the most support of our entire collection. For added support, pair one of those tanks with our BLANQI Maternity Belly Support Leggings! Make sure to identify your correct size in our size chart – just select your current height & weight for the best fit!

settings.title: Do the Maternity Belly Support Girlshorts replace my regular shorts? Are these underwear?
settings.text: The Maternity Belly Support Girlshorts can be worn alone or layered! They work great under dresses for added belly support in place of a slip. While some may find this replaces underwear, it does not have a built-in gusset. The gusset was designed to help minimize irritation to sensitive and swollen private bits by sewing the crotch area horizontal rather than vertical, eliminating the dreaded camel toe.

settings.title: Does the BLANQI Body Cooling Maternity Cami have the same belly support as the BLANQI Everyday Maternity Tank Top?
settings.text: Our Body Cooling Maternity Cami is a lightweight layering cami that is meant to provide the ultimate in comfort and cooling during your pregnancy. We used a lighter-weight spandex to knit this breathable cami and provide light support for a growing belly bump. Our Everyday Maternity Tank Top on the other hand has a much higher spandex count and tighter knit to help lift and support a belly bump while easing lower back pain. If you find the Everyday Maternity Tank Top to be too tight or supportive for sleeping or all-day wear, we highly recommend trying out the Body Cooling Maternity Cami as a comfortable, lightweight alternative.

settings.title: Can I nurse in the BLANQI Body Cooling Racerback Tank?
settings.text: Yes! We designed our cooling racerback tank to have great stretch & recovery at the neckline for ease of pulling down to nurse. As an alternative, you can simply lift the tank to nurse as well. This tank feels cool and slick against your body, so it should help keep you comfortable during those sweaty, early postpartum days. By the way, our Body Cooling Racerback Tank is great to workout in!

settings.title: What are your garments made of?
settings.text:
Our seamless garments are currently designed in the United States and knit & sewn in Ecuador and Turkey. We use a top tier supply chain for our private label, made up of premium yarn suppliers & garment manufacturers that service many of the top brands in the world. Our suppliers adhere to a stringent code of compliance to ensure proper working conditions, fair wages, age appropriate workers, and a safe work environment.

Our denim is designed in LA and manufactured in China. We maintain to utilize only the top fabric mills & garment manufacturers for our product extensions.

settings.title: How do I prevent my BLANQI leggings & tanks from pilling?
settings.text: Simple! All of our BLANQI seamless products should be washed WITHOUT fabric softener. Fabric softener strips our garments of their beautiful finishing and weakens the fibers, making our leggings, tanks & belly bands prone to pilling. For best results, follow our wash & care instructions listed below or on your care label found conveniently inside each of our BLANQI products!

settings.title: What's the deal with Refer a Friend?
settings.text: Refer a Friend is our referral program that allows you to share a code with friends for $20 off their first BLANQI.com purchase and in return you receive $20 off your next BLANQI.com purchase after they buy! To share, simply enter your email on our Refer A Friend page and you will be prompted to enter your friends email addresses (or connect to Facebook Messenger) to share!

settings.title: How do I find out about BLANQI sales?
settings.text: Easy! Sign up for our newsletter to be the first to know about flash sales & our big 50% off sale that happens only twice a year!

settings.title: How does Afterpay work?
settings.text: Split up your order total into 4 easy payments by selecting 'Afterpay' at checkout! If you're new to Afterpay, you will be prompted to first set up an account prior to checkout. Once you set up an account, your order will be split into 4 easy payments, to be billed to your credit card every 2 weeks, free of any additional charge or interest! Your first payment will be due at checkout. Don't worry, we will ship your product(s) as soon as you place your order so there's no waiting to enjoy your BLANQI!

settings.title: Where are your products made?
settings.text: Our seamless garments are currently designed in the United States and knit & sewn in Ecuador, Turkey, Sri Lanka and China. We use a top tier supply chain for our private label, made up of premium yarn suppliers & garment manufacturers that service many of the top brands in the world. Our suppliers adhere to a stringent code of compliance to ensure proper working conditions, fair wages, age-appropriate workers, and a safe work environment. Our denim is designed in LA and manufactured in China. We maintain to utilize only the top fabric mills & garment manufacturers for our product extensions.

settings.copy: The ultimate pregnancy gamechanger. All of our technical support features to ease the pains and strains of pregnancy, seamlessly built-in to a full coverage tank top.

GIVE THE GIFT EVERYONE SECRETLY WANTS — THE GIFT OF CHOICE!

settings.copy: Creators of kids wear so adorably cute you’ll be wishing it came in your size, Little Adi + Co delivers quality staples for hip, modern kids

settings.copy: Encouraging young imaginations to soar, Nuby products cater to feeding, weaning, soothing, and bath time. Did we mention they’re BPA-free? That, too.

settings.copy: For the happiest baby on the block, the SNOO Smart Sleeper calms crying, boosts sleep, and soothes irritable babies like a dream.

settings.title: Ollie World The Smarter Swaddle
settings.copy: Smartly crafted from moisture-wicking material, the Ollie is gentle on skin and designed for a custom fit for any sized infant.

fully designed diaper bags would never dream of using harsh chemicals like BPA and PVC.

settings.copy: From weighted, sippy straw cups to stackable lunch containers, ZoLi creates best-in-class products that are as eco-friendly as they are baby-friendly

settings.copy: the first-ever nursing leggings on the market! mamas will appreciate the extra high-rise fit — your little one might be wiggling but your tummy won’t be.

Meet Bannor Toys, a sweet line

settings.copy: Created for bodies that motherhood made, the world's first high-performance, nursing support tank WITH AN Open-bust design for effortless breastfeeding.

settings.title: Bla Bla Kids Dolls
settings.copy: Hand knitted by Peruvian artisans using Fair Trade practices and sustainably sourced cotton, Bla Bla Kids has become a cult fave for whimsical cuddle buddies.

settings.title: Little Blue Nest Baby Organic Cotton Muslin Quilt

settings.disclaimer_description:
Black colorway runs small - please size up

Due to the nature of seamless manufacturing, there are sometimes variations from batch to batch.  Our latest round of black leggings are running a bit smaller than usual, so we recommend sizing up for a more comfortable fit.  Please continue ordering your normal size for our other colors.
